lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said an announcement would be made "as soon as possible" on an agreement and the ECGD would create a package for Nigeria that would include the department's normal range of export trade support facilities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While the ECGD would initially continue to use this structure under a new package, it would also hope to expand the volume of coverage in the short-term area and relax the terms it is prepared to underwrite towards the commonly accepted maximum of 180 days.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Following last week's bilateral accord between Britain and Nigeria to reschedule the country's insured trade debts, bankers had hoped that talks would commence on a resumption of cover.

lst.name: sentence
